content: Got leave? JetBlue offers troops $1 fares May 6, 2009 Service members who act quickly might be able to snag a flight to the beach or the Big Apple for a single dollar. JetBlue is offering active-duty troops $1 fares from Washington Dulles International Airport, Va., and Richmond International Airport, Va., in honor of Military Appreciation Month. As with any offer this good, there are numerous restrictions: Full article at ... >>>http://www.armytimes.com/news/2009/05/military_jetblue_fare_050609/
